23c1da23-b785-425f-8324-05fd55a7ec9b.prompt:
The uv dependencies manager accepts inline dependencies declaration with the following form:

```py
# /// script
# dependencies = [
#   ...
# ]
# ///
```

For example to add requests and rich as dependencies:

```py
# /// script
# dependencies = [
#   "requests",
#   "rich",
# ]
# ///
```

Please include this header in the script.
23c1da23-b785-425f-8324-05fd55a7ec9b.title: uv prerequisistes
